function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wearable sensors and medical equipment may act as fomites for the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among patients and healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of wearable sensors and medical equipment, and compliance with infection control protocols.","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, such as UV-C disinfection and antimicrobial coatings for equipment.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Real-time communication of disease status may lead to privacy and security risks.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive patient information and potential data breaches.","Mitigation":"Implement encryption and secure communication protocols, and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, secure messaging platforms, and access control mechanisms.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facility IT department"},{"Description":"Integration of IoT technologies may introduce vulnerabilities to the healthcare system.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to cyber attacks and disruptions to healthcare operations.","Mitigation":"Regular security assessments, implementation of IoT security best practices, and training for healthcare staff on cybersecurity measures.","Technologies":"IoT security solutions, network monitoring tools, and staff cybersecurity training programs.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, IT staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility IT department"}]}
